Sentencas: Synchrotron-based X-ray techniques have been used to study in situ the structural and chemical changes of film cathodes during half-cell operations.
Titulo: In situ X-ray studies of film cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The X-ray techniques used include X-ray reflectivity (XR), total-reflection X-ray fluorescence (TXRF), high-resolution diffraction (HRD), ultra-small angle X-ray scattering (USAXS).
Titulo: In situ X-ray studies of film cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The epitaxial thin film model cathodes for XR, TXRF, and HRD measurements are made by pulse laser deposition and porous film cathodes for USAX measurements are made by screen printing technique.
Titulo: In situ X-ray studies of film cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The experimental results reviewed here include A-site and B-site segregations, lattice expansion, oxidation-state changes during cell operations and liquid-phase infiltration and coarsening of cathode to electrolyte backbone.
Titulo: In situ X-ray studies of film cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells
In situ X-ray studies of film cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells
